description: WDFW will estimate the number of HOR steelhead residuals, using a stratified Peterson mark-recapture survey method (Ricker 1958, Viola and Schuck 1997).   In late June, project and LSRCP staff, and likely with the help from a local fishing group, will hook-and-line survey multiple 1-mile reaches of the Tucannon River.  Approximately 1-week later, each previously sampled section will be hook-and-line surveyed again, with surveyors keeping records on marked/unmarked fish and their size/group.  A population estimate for each reach will be calculated.  River sections not surveyed will be estimated using the mark/recapture estimates from nearby areas, with an expanded estimate for the entire river provided.

areasOfInferences.areaTypeName: Steelhead Summer-Winter Interior Columbia Pop. Name

title: WDFW Steelhead Residualism Surveys Tucannon River
